title: The Bronx Arts Ensemble and The Hostos Center for the Arts & Culture celebrate Puerto Rican Heritage Month with Los Jibaros, a fully staged opera criolla in two scenes
creator: The Bronx Arts Ensemble and The Hostos Center for the Arts & Culture celebrate Puerto Rican Heritage Month with Los Jibaros, a fully staged opera criolla in two scenes
description: Poster adverstising the Bronx Arts Ensemble and The Hostos Center for the Arts & Culture celebration of Puerto Rican Heritage Month with the presentation of "Los Jibaros," a fully staged opera composed by Manuel B. González. William Scribner is names at The Bronx Art Ensemble Orchestra's executive/artistic director; Jan Józef Wnek is named as the conductor; and Pablo Cabrera is named as the director. The opera starred Evangelina Cólon, Hilda Ramos, Edgardo Zayas, Valentín Fernández, Carlos Conde and the Hostos Community College Chorus.
subject: Hispanic American theater; Posters; Opera; Jíbaro (Puerto Rican identity)
source: Hispanic Theater Collection. Arte Público Press/Recovering the US Hispanic Literary Heritage.
